author: Reuters Editorial
title: TABLE-Foreign investors buy S.Korea bonds for 2nd month in Jan
text: SEOUL, Feb 13 (Reuters) - The following are foreign investors' holdings in local bonds and stocks for January, released by South Korea's Financial Supervisory Service on Tuesday (in trillion won): January December Bonds *100.9 98.5 Stocks *658.8 635.9 *Foreign investors purchased a net 3.24 trillion won ($2.99 billion) of local stocks and a net 4.62 trillion won of local bonds in January. ($1 = 1,083.0900 won) (Reporting by Dahee Kim; Editing by Kim Coghill)
